title: Power of Two - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an integer n, write a function to determine if it is a power of two.   Example 1: Input: n = 1
Output: true

Output: true
Explanation: 24 = 16

title: Palindrome Number - Math - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Determine whether an integer is a palindrome. An integer is a palindrome when it reads the same backward as forward. Example 1: Input: 121
Output: true

Output: false

content:
